designer.translate: дизайнер, конструктор, проектировщик, модельер, оформитель, рисовальщик, чертежник

She made a copy of the designer dress.
In his designer suit and shiny shoes he looked quite the man about town.
a creative and innovative young designer

street vendors selling sham designer handbags to gullible tourists

a shop selling caviar, foie gras, designer chocolates, and other pricey viands
